body: Oh no. This was foreshadowed in Chapter 2 but I didn’t expect it to come to this. On a side note, if Mizuryu had the time, he could probably have made an actual card game. This actually has the same over-the-top stuff as YGO. This could sell like hotcakes if he made a sfw version of this.
Where did that demon-harpy like come from? Looks like it came from nowhere
